name: Swing Smash (ANordicNerd)
description:
This game is about swinging and smashing!!

In this game you control a wrecking ball and you need to hit enemies that hunts for your mouse. Dont get hit to many times or you die!

Controls: Mouse to control wreckingball. Key 1 to use your freeze ability. Key 2 to use your shockwave ability. Mouse Scrollwheel to control the length when you buy that ability.

Have Fun!

Comment your Score!

Credits: 

Thanks To Cron Audio on the unity asset store for the music!
